sentences.en: A dime is a tenth of a dollar.
sentences.cn: 一角银币是十分之一美元.

sentences.en: A dime is a tenth part of a dollar.
sentences.cn: 一角银币是一美元的十分之一.

sentences.en: A dime is equal to 10 cents.
sentences.cn: 一角的硬币相当于十美分.

sentences.en: A dime is the equivalent of two nickels.
sentences.cn: 一角硬币等于两个五分镍币.
廉价商店出售日用小商品.

sentences.en: a sports car that stops on a dime.
at some point you have to get off the dime and do something.
sentences.cn: 在适当的时候，你要果断地采取行动。

sentences.en: Brother, can you spare a dime.
sentences.cn: 老兄, 能借给我一角钱吗?

sentences.en: Filling stations have whacked as much as a dime off their regular prices.
sentences.cn: 加油站已经把正常价格降了一角银币。

sentences.en: He had sought to deprive us of dime.
sentences.cn: 他企图剥夺我们一角钱.

sentences.en: I had to make some nickel - and - dime repairs on my old Chevy.
sentences.cn: 我那辆雪佛兰老爷车需要不少零零星星的修理.

sentences.en: In Hollywood , pretty girls are a dime a dozen.
sentences.cn: 在好莱坞漂亮姑娘多的是.

sentences.en: In the squares place a penny, nickel, dime and quarter in that order. The object is to reverse the order of these coins.
sentences.cn: 在这些方块中按顺序放置1分、5分、10分和25分的硬币各一枚。目标是颠倒这些硬币的顺序。

sentences.en: It's not earning you a dime interest.
sentences.cn: 它没给你带来一分利息.

sentences.en: The gentleman looked him over and fished for a dime.
sentences.cn: 这个绅士打量了他一下,伸手想摸块1角的银币.

sentences.en: The stamps of this sort are a dime a dozen.
This car can turn on a dime.
sentences.cn: 这车能在极小的地方转弯.

phrases.phrase: drop a (或 the) dime on someone

phrases.tran_cn: 在极小范围内：恰恰在这一点上；在一个狭窄的限定的区域内

trans.tran_en: a coin of the US and Canada, worth one tenth of a dollar
